description: Lady Lydia is as experienced and cruel as she is beautiful, and in this week’s update she dishes out predicaments and pain with a smile. First, euro is bound in a military stress position with his balls tied to the floor while Lydia teaches him the value of good manners. She then makes him crawl in CBT, wear dozens of clothespins, and endure her mocking cruelty before he finally begs to be fucked in the ass.
title: Lady Lydia McLane and totaleurosex
